channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0349; 07:02AM; 6920 W Sunset Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4bz3u4x" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4bz3u4x</a>; #Hollywood; It took 45 firefighters 29 minutes to knockdown flames in this vacant building. One 35-year-old female patient was transported to a local hospital with burn injuries. LAFD heavy equipment operators, along with Building and Safety, will be on-scene to evaluate the building (the site of multiple previous burns) for demolition due to safety concerns. Sunset Boulevard is closed between Highland Avenue and Orange Drive. PIO Adam Vangerpen is on-scene for media staging at Sunset and Highland.; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC18 BC5 CM52 E227 E235 E261 E27 E41 E76 E82 EM5 HE1 RA27 RA41 RA82 RA827 SO1 T27 T35 T61; CH7; 12 13; Lyndsey Lantz

Structure Fire; INC#0349; 06:33AM; 6920 W Sunset Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4bz3u4x" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4bz3u4x</a>; Hollywood; When the men and women of the LAFD responded to this 2 story vacant structure, they found heavy fire showing, from this site of a previous burn. Firefighters are utilizing heavy streams to protect exposures. One patient being evaluated by paramedics on scene, no other patients reported.; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC18 BC5 E227 E235 E261 E27 E41 E76 E82 RA27 RA827 T27 T35 T61; CH9; 13; Melissa Kelley

Safety Message; INC#0991; 05:50PM; 15700 W Burbank Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3RG8PQg" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3RG8PQg</a>; Sepulveda Basin; The LAFD and LAPD is asking that ALL NEWS HELICOPTERS MOVE OUTSIDE A 1.5 MILE PERIMETER as a safety precaution so that units can utilize drones to aid in the investigation of the blast that injured a firefighter today.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; CH8; 12; Melissa Kelley

Update Brush Fire; INC#0991; 01:32PM; 15700 W Burbank Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3RG8PQg" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3RG8PQg</a>; Sepulveda Basin; As the fire fight raged on, it took 80 men and women of the LAFD just under 30 minutes to stop the forward spread of fire in the brush. There were no other injuries reported to civilians or firefighters. Due to the mechanism of injury being from a blast, the firefighter was transported to Northridge Hospital via Air Ambulance. The injuries to the Firefighter are now considered to be serious but not life threatening. PIO Erik Scott is at the Hospital to answer media inquires. Cause will remain under investigation.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; CH5; 12; Melissa Kelley

Brush Fire; INC#0991; 01:32PM; 15700 W Burbank Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3RG8PQg" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3RG8PQg</a>; Sepulveda Basin; Los Angeles Firefighters responded to a half acre of grass burning in a homeless encampment. As firefighters made access to the flames, there was an explosion causing an injury to a firefighter. The Incident Commander then called for an air ambulance, while simultaneously upgrading the incident to a full brush assignment to battle the persistent flames, and care for one of our own.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 BC15 BC731 BC9 CM20 CM22 E100 E105 E109 E288 E293 E81 E83 E88 EM10 EM15 H1 H6 H7 HA1 HA6 HA7 HE1 RA88 SO1 T88 T93 WT88; CH5; 12; Melissa Kelley

Knockdown - Greater Alarm Fire; INC#1257; 05:33PM; 5058 E Valley Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3xCN3WD" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3xCN3WD</a>; #ElSereno; 88 Firefighters took just 32 minutes to fully contain and extinguish an intense outside fire involving a large number of stored tires, that briefly threatened - but was ultimately prevented from extending into the adjacent 675 square foot one-story automotive tire business ("Cano's Tires"). No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 16; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC13 BC14 BC2 BC5 CM20 CM22 E1 E16 E2 E201 E202 E212 E227 E25 E27 E289 E47 EM11 EM5 HR3 RA1 RA47 SO1 SQ21 T1 T12 T2 T27 T89 T9 UR27 UR88; CH9; 12 14; Brian Humphrey

Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1257; 05:01PM; 5058 E Valley Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3xCN3WD" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3xCN3WD</a>; #ElSereno; PRELIM: Outside fire (involving tires) has extended to a one-story 20' x 30' commercial business.; FS 16; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC13 BC14 BC2 CM20 CM22 E1 E16 E2 E201 E202 E212 E227 E25 E27 E289 E47 EM11 EM5 HR3 RA1 RA47 SQ21 T1 T12 T2 T27 T89 T9 UR27 UR88 ; CH9; 12, 14; Brian Humphrey

Hiker Rescue; INC#0695; 11:41AM; Temescal Ridge Trail; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4c3paGR" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4c3paGR</a>; #PacificPalisades; LAFD ground and air response to an ill 55 year-old male hiker dehydrated and unable to walk in hot weather near the conclusion of his journey on a remote section of the Temescal Ridge Trail. An LAFD Rescue Helicopter lowered a Flight Paramedic to medically assess and stabilize the patient, who has been hoisted along with the LAFD Flight Paramedic into the hovering helicopter for continuing in-flight care during direct air transport to an area hospital.; FS 69; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; E269 E69 H1 H3 HA1 HA3 RA69 RH114 T69; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Contained - Brush Fire; INC#1383; 05:43PM; 11360 N Alethea Dr; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3zeYQuZ" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3zeYQuZ</a>; #Sunland; First arriving LAFD, LACoFD and ANF firefighters have full (100%) containment of the fire at one-eighth (0.125) acre of light-to-medium brush. No structure damage. No evacuation. Law enforcement will soon be reopening Big Tujunga Canyon Road in both directions between Mt. Gleason Avenue and Big Canyon Drive as firefighting operations are complete. The cause of the fire is under investigation. This incident was known as the #NationalFire.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC14 BP74 E274 E289 E60 E7 E77 E86 E89 E90 E98 EM14 H1 H3 H5 HA1 HA3 HA5 RA77 RA89 T74 T89 + LACoFD + ANF; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey

Brush Fire; INC#1383; 05:43PM; 11360 N Alethea Dr; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3zeYQuZ" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3zeYQuZ</a>; #Sunland; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response with Los Angeles County (LACoFD) and Angeles National Forest (ANF) Firefighters to less than one (1) acre light-to-medium brush burning in a Mutual Threat Zone near the agencies' common border. No structure threat. No evacuation. Law enforcement has been requested to close Big Tujunga Canyon Road in both directions between Mt. Gleason Avenue and Big Canyon Drive until firefighting operations are complete. This incident is known as the #NationalFire.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC14 E274 E289 E60 E7 E77 E86 E89 E90 E98 EM14 H1 H3 H5 HA1 HA3 HA5 RA77 RA89 T74 T89 + LACoFD + ANF; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey
